title: Stream: Sigur Rós – Valtari
body:
At 19:00 this evening, **Sigur Rós** will stream their sixth studio album in it’s entirety, both via their [own website](http://www.sigur-ros.co.uk/valtari/hour/) and the widget below. _**Valtari**_ is set to be released on 28 May, and has been described by the group as _“ambient” “introverted” “floaty”_ and _“minimal”_. Previously heard tracks include _Dauðalogn_, _[Ekki Mukk](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/15822-video-sigur-ros-ekki-mukk/)_ and the Record Store Day exclusive _Kvistur._

So, whatever you’re supposed to be doing at 19:00 GMT, scrap it, and join us here for what **Sigur Rós** are dubbing ‘**Valtari Hour**‘. Tune in and share your thoughts below.

Valtari Tracklisting

1\. Ég Anda

2\. Ekki Múkk

3\. Varúð

4\. Rembihnútur

5\. Dauðalogn

6\. Varðeldur

7\. Valtari

8\. Fjögúr Píanó

9\. Logn (Pre-order Bonus Track)

10\. Kvistur (Pre-order Bonus Track)
